channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Cloudflare named a Strong Performer in Email Security by Forrester】Cloudflare命名了Forrester的Email Security的强大表现
item.description: 【 Forrester has recognized Cloudflare Email Security as a Strong Performer in the ‘current offering’ category in “The Forrester Wave™: Email, Messaging, And Collaboration Security Solutions. 】Forrester在“ Forrester Wave™：电子邮件，消息传递和协作安全解决方案中的“当前产品”类别中，CloudFlare电子邮件安全性是强大的表现。

item.title: 【Let’s DO this: detecting Workers Builds errors across 1 million Durable Objects】让我们这样做：检测工人在100万个耐用物体中构建错误
item.description: 【 Workers Builds, our CI/CD product for deploying Workers, monitors build issues by analyzing build failure metadata spread across over one million Durable Objects. 】工人建造了我们用于部署工人的CI/CD产品，通过分析构建故障元数据扩散到超过一百万耐用的物体中，监视构建问题。

item.title: 【Resolving a request smuggling vulnerability in Pingora】解决Pingora中的走私漏洞的请求
item.description: 【 Cloudflare patched a vulnerability (CVE-2025-4366) in the Pingora OSS framework, which exposed users of the framework and Cloudflare CDN’s free tier to potential request smuggling attacks. 】CloudFlare修补了Pingora OSS框架中的漏洞（CVE-2025-4366），该漏洞使该框架的用户和Cloudflare CDN的自由层次接触了潜在的请求走私攻击。

item.title: 【Forget IPs: using cryptography to verify bot and agent traffic】忘记IPS：使用密码学验证机器人和代理流量
item.description: 【 Bots now browse like humans. We're proposing bots use cryptographic signatures so that website owners can verify their identity. Explanations and demonstration code can be found within the post. 】机器人现在像人类一样浏览。我们正在提议使用加密签名，以便网站所有者可以验证其身份。可以在帖子中找到说明和演示代码。

item.title: 【Building an AI Agent that puts humans in the loop with Knock and Cloudflare’s Agents SDK】建立一个AI代理，将人类用敲门和Cloudflare的代理SDK进入循环
item.description: 【 How Knock shipped an AI Agent with human-in-the-loop capabilities with Cloudflare’s Agents SDK and Cloudflare Workers. 】如何使用Cloudflare的代理商SDK和Cloudflare工人使用人类的AI代理商进行了AI代理。

item.title: 【Cloudflare named in 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Security Service Edge】CloudFlare在2025年命名的Gartner®MagicQuadrant™安全服务边缘
item.description: 【 For the third consecutive year, Gartner has named Cloudflare to the Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Security Service Edge (SSE) report. 】Gartner连续第三年将Cloudflare命名为Security Service Edge（SSE）报告的Gartner®MagicQuadrant™。

item.title: 【Vulnerability transparency: strengthening security through responsible disclosure】脆弱性透明度：通过负责任的披露加强安全性
item.description: 【 In line with CISA’s Secure By Design pledge, Cloudflare shares its vulnerability disclosure process, CVE issuance criteria, and CNA duties. 】根据CISA的设计承诺，CloudFlare共享其脆弱性披露过程，CVE发行标准和CNA职责。

item.title: 【Bringing connections into view: real-time BGP route visibility on Cloudflare Radar】将连接融入视图：实时BGP路线可见性
item.description: 【 Real-time BGP route visualization is now available on Cloudflare Radar, providing immediate insights into global Internet routing. 】现在可以在CloudFlare Radar上使用实时BGP路由可视化，从而立即洞悉全球Internet路由。

item.title: 【Performance measurements… and the people who love them】绩效测量…和爱他们的人
item.description: 【 Developers have a gut-felt understanding for performance, but that intuition breaks down when systems reach Cloudflare’s scale. 】开发人员对性能有肠道的了解，但是当系统达到Cloudflare的规模时，直觉会破裂。

item.title: 【Your IPs, your rules: enabling more efficient address space usage】您的IPS，您的规则：启用更有效的地址空间使用情况
item.description: 【 IPv4 is expensive, and moving network resources around is hard. Previously, when customers wanted to use multiple Cloudflare services, they had to bring a new address range. 】IPv4很昂贵，而移动网络资源很难。以前，当客户想使用多个CloudFlare服务时，他们必须带来一个新的地址范围。
